channel.title: [Delta] GalaxyScape - Looking for a team!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://galaxyscape.netii.net/homeimages/toplogo.png[/img][/center]
Hey guys, I have decided that working on this server on my own isn't going to work out, and I need some help from you guys.
[b]THIS IS NOT A REMAKE, THIS IS A PK SERVER![/b]
Here are some staff that I am looking for:
[u][b]Owner:[/b][/u] Ian1045 (Mod Lind)
[u][b]Content Developers:[/b][/u] Mod Kieran Mod Rand
[u][b]Client Developers:[/b][/u] (I am in desperate need of 1-2 people to work on/get a client working, as I have only been using the moparscape client to work on/test my source.) Open Open
[u][b]Graphics Designer:[/b][/u] Voltage07 _____________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]If you would like to join, please fill out this application, and use it in your reply:[/b] [b]Skype is manditory![/b]
Skype Name: Position you are applying for: Years of experience: Proof of your work: How well do you work with others?: What type of things can you do for us?(Examples: More quests, combat system, etc...):
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________
I do not need a website developer, as I do that myself. Check out what I have made so far on the website here: [url=http://www.galaxyscape.netii.net/]http://www.galaxyscape.netii.net/[/url]
[u][b]Pictures of Content:[/b][/u]
[b]Edgeville:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4EzWd.png[/img]
[b]Quests:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q0XhT.png[/img]
[b]Wilderness Levels:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PTfgF.png[/img]
[b]There is some other content, that you can view by checking out the progress thread here:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570152.msg4132404.html#msg4132404]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570152.msg4132404.html#msg4132404[/url]
*Note: Please do not hate on me for it being Delta, this is our choice, and we feel most comfortable with it.

[center][/center]

Hey guys, I have decided that working on this server on my own isn’t going to work out, and I need some help from you guys.

THIS IS NOT A REMAKE, THIS IS A PK SERVER!
